channel.title: Need help with webs.com webclient
channel.description:
Ok so i used the guide here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0.html I successfully jarred my client :D but in the topic he says to edit the index, so i got rid of everything in there and put this [code]<html> <html> <title> AssassinPKS </title> <body onbeforeunload="javascript:alert('Be sure your account is logged out before closing this page!');"> <applet name="AssassinPKS" width="100%" height="100%" archive="AssassinPKS.jar" code="loader.class" mayscript=""> <param name="worldid" value="2"/> <param name="members" value="1"/> <param name="modewhat" value="2"/> <param name="modewhere" value="2"/> <param name="safemode" value="1"/> <param name="lang" value="0"/> <param name="affid" value="0"/> <param name="settings" value="ROEqp2kbj*NX9PSCbdgpOvokkMwrCkXjg3c6KXgaLZY"/> <param name="cookieprefix" value=""/> <param name="cookiehost" value=".google.com"/> <param name="plug" value="0"/> <param name="js" value="1"/> <param name="game" value="0"/> <param name="colourid" value="0"/> </applet> </body> </html>
[/code] (Assassinpks is the name of my server) So then i uploaded my jarred file and it looks like this: http://gyazo.com/1bdf39964da727f46491ae957e870828 And my site looks like this: http://gyazo.com/1e4e7a3c36d07da2ab74a2e4c16c99a1 and there is no client can i please have help to fix it? Thanks!!!

item.title: Need help with webs.com webclient

item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

sweet it works! what are some good dimensions for a 718?

item.title: Need help with webs.com webclient
item.dc:creator: @iLL_Scape iLL Scape
item.description:
@iLL_Scape wrote:

Whats wrong is the width and height Remove the %'s and change the width to 765 instead of 100 and the height to 503 in stead of 100.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with webs.com webclient
item.dc:creator: @PkingAddict PkingAddict
item.description:
@PkingAddict wrote:

Nononoo you have did everything good, the only thing is that you need to add the html code , just go to the second or third button @ ur edit screen and paste ur code there

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with webs.com webclient
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

Ok so i used the guide here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0.html
I successfully jarred my client but in the topic he says to edit the index, so i got rid of everything in there and put this

[code]

AssassinPKS

[/code]
(Assassinpks is the name of my server)
So then i uploaded my jarred file and it looks like this: http://gyazo.com/1bdf39964da727f46491ae957e870828
And my site looks like this: http://gyazo.com/1e4e7a3c36d07da2ab74a2e4c16c99a1
and there is no client can i please have help to fix it? Thanks!!!
